data.prayer: Father, move the 91,954 believers in the state of Västra Götaland to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Västra Götaland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Västra Götaland to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Västra Götaland.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Västra Götaland, Sweden be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mandeaen people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mandeaen people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mandeaen people is yours.
Father, help the 91,954 believers in Västra Götaland to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,508,446 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 802,103 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Västra Götaland. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

location.name: Västra Götaland
